items.content_html: Angular Drag Drop Layout is a lightweight, dependency-free Angular library for creating highly customizable, responsive grid layouts with drag-and-drop functionality. Built with Angular 18 and utilizing Angular Signals, this library provides a seamless and optimized experience for building dynamic and interactive layouts.
items.title: skutam/angular-drag-drop-layout: Angular Drag Drop Layout is a lightweight, dependency-free Angular library for creating highly customizable, responsive grid layouts with drag-and-drop functionality. items.content_html: The Expense Management System is a lightweight web application built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript that helps users track and manage their expenses. It allows users to add, edit, and delete expenses with ease through a simple and intuitive interface. The app includes a dark mode toggle and works seamlessly across all devices.
items.title: Vasu10134/expense-management-system: The Expense Management System is a lightweight web application built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript that helps users track and manage their expenses. It allows users to add, edit, and delete expenses with ease through a simple and intuitive interface. The app includes a dark mode toggle and works seamlessly across all devices.

items.content_html: The File Management System is a lightweight web application built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript that helps users organize and manage their files. It provides features like uploading, viewing, and deleting files with a simple interface. The app also includes a dark mode toggle and is optimized for cross-device compatibility.
items.title: Vasu10134/file-management-system: The File Management System is a lightweight web application built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript that helps users organize and manage their files. It provides features like uploading, viewing, and deleting files with a simple interface. The app also includes a dark mode toggle and is optimized for cross-device compatibility.

items.content_html: StockFlow (Reflects the flow of goods in and out of your inventory) is a lightweight desktop application for efficient goods and inventory management.
